title: 【1.9+】蓄力暴击
author: 彪悍的新手
txt_content:
打不过一波波怪物？
本店推出『蓄力暴击』“插件”

OOC命令：
/summon FallingSand ~ ~1 ~2 {Time:1,Block:"minecraft:redstone_block",Passengers:[{id:"FallingSand",Time:1,Block:"minecraft:activator_rail",Passengers:[{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/tellraw @a {"text":"欢迎使用[一击必杀]原版MOD"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/scoreboard objectives add stest stat.crouchOneCm  ===蓄力表==="},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/scoreboard objectives setdisplay sidebar stest"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/scoreboard players set @a stest 0"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/gamerule commandBlockOutput false"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~0 repeating_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/tp @e[name=sneak] ~ ~-300 ~"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/kill @e[name=sneak]"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/summon Villager ~ ~ ~ {NoAI:true,Silent:true,Invulnerable:true,ActiveEffects:[{Id:14,Duration:111110,ShowParticles:false}],Age:-1000000,CustomName:sneak}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/execute @p ~ ~ ~ /tp @e[name=sneak] @p"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~2 ~0 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/tp @e[name=sneak] ~0.01 ~ ~"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~4 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 12 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/scoreboard players set @p[score_stest_min=930] stest 0"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~2 ~1 repeating_command_block 4 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/effect @p[score_stest_min=901] minecraft:hunger 1 8 true"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/effect @p[score_stest_min=901] minecraft:haste 4 5 true"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 4 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/effect @p[score_stest_min=901] minecraft:resistance 5 10 true"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~1 chain_command_block 3 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/effect @p[score_stest_min=901] minecraft:speed 4 5 true"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~0 ~2 ~2 chain_command_block 5 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/effect @p[score_stest_min=901] minecraft:strength 3 10 true"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~1 ~2 ~2 chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/execute @p[score_stest_min=900] ~ ~ ~ particle hugeexplosion ~ ~ ~ 0 0 0 0.5 10"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~2 chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/execute @p[score_stest_min=901] ~ ~ ~ summon VillagerGolem ~ ~1 ~ {Attributes:[{Name:generic.maxHealth,Base:5d}],CustomName:\\"金刚卫士\\",CustomNameVisible:1,Glowing:1b,PlayerCreated:1b}"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~3 ~2 ~2 chain_command_block 13 replace {auto:1b,Command:"/scoreboard players set @p stest 0"}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~-1 ~5 ~3 ~5 stained_glass 8 outline"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~1 ~-1 ~5 ~1 ~5 purpur_block 0"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"fill ~-1 ~3 ~-1 ~5 ~3 ~5 purpur_block 0"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~2 ~2 ~-2 wall_sign 8 replace {"text":"删除模块","clickEvent":{"action":"run_command","value":"{Delete Module}"}}"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"/setblock ~ ~-1 ~ minecraft:lava 15"},{id:"MinecartCommandBlock",Command:"setblock ~ ~ ~ air 0"}]}]}复制代码


如何使用？
将以上指令输入命令方块后运行
随后原地做1000下蹲起蹲下蓄力（行走蓄力更快哦~）
[diamond_sword] 当右边蓄力表到达900下之后就会发生神奇的事情
会有几秒暴击以及无敌可以利用
还会召唤1个炮灰

replies.author: Ayingshigui
replies.txt_content: 这个铁傀儡怎么外面有白色

replies.author: 2001whl
replies.txt_content:
Ayingshigui 发表于 2016-3-17 21:08
这个铁傀儡怎么外面有白色
因为被光灵箭射中了

replies.txt_content: 阿，这不是@贰逼 的点子吗。。
大 佬 牛 逼
